af.title: Voltooi {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-Dag Streep
af.shortDescription: Hou jou mynboustreek vir {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dae aaneen.
af.longDescription: Voltooi mynbou vir {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} agtereenvolgende dae om 'n spesiale beloning te verdien.
af.errorDescription: Streekverifikasie het misluk. Maak seker dat jy {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} agtereenvolgende dae voltooi het.

ar.title: أكمل سلسلة تعدين لمدة {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} أيام
ar.shortDescription: احتفظ بسلسلة التعدين الخاصة بك لمدة {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} أيام متتالية.
ar.longDescription: أكمل جلسات التعدين لمدة {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} أيام متتالية للحصول على مكافأة خاصة.
ar.errorDescription: فشلت عملية التحقق من السلسلة. يرجى التأكد من أنك أكملت {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} أيام متتالية.

az.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} Günlük Seriyanı Tamamlayın
az.longDescription: Xüsusi mükafat qazanmaq üçün ardıcıl {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} gün mədənçilik sessiyalarını tamamlayın.
az.errorDescription: Seriya təsdiqi uğursuz oldu. Zəhmət olmasa ardıcıl {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} günü tamamladığınıza əmin olun.

bg.title: Завършете серия от {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} дни
bg.shortDescription: Запазете своята серия от добив в продължение на {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} поредни дни.
bg.longDescription: Завършете добивните сесии за {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} последователни дни, за да спечелите специална награда.
bg.errorDescription: Проверката на серията не бе успешна. Моля, уверете се, че сте завършили {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} последователни дни.

bn.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-দিনের স্ট্রীক সম্পূর্ণ করুন
bn.shortDescription: টানা {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} দিন আপনার মাইনিং স্ট্রীক বজায় রাখুন।
bn.longDescription: একটি বিশেষ পুরস্কার অর্জন করতে টানা {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} দিনের জন্য মাইনিং সেশন সম্পূর্ণ করুন।
bn.errorDescription: স্ট্রীক যাচাইকরণ ব্যর্থ হয়েছে। অনুগ্রহ করে নিশ্চিত করুন আপনি টানা {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} দিন সম্পূর্ণ করেছেন।

cs.title: Dokončete sérii {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dní
cs.shortDescription: Udržujte svou těžební sérii po dobu {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dní v kuse.
cs.longDescription: Dokončete těžební seance po dobu {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} po sobě jdoucích dní a získejte speciální odměnu.
cs.errorDescription: Ověření série selhalo. Ujistěte se, že jste dokončili těžbu {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} po sobě jdoucích dní.

de.title: Beende eine {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-Tage-Serie
de.shortDescription: Halte deine Mining-Serie für {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} Tage durch.
de.longDescription: Beende Mining-Sitzungen für {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} aufeinanderfolgende Tage, um eine spezielle Belohnung zu erhalten.
de.errorDescription: Die Serienverifizierung ist fehlgeschlagen. Bitte stelle sicher, dass du {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} aufeinanderfolgende Tage abgeschlossen hast.

el.title: Ολοκληρώστε το σερί {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ημερών
el.shortDescription: Διατηρήστε το σερί εξόρυξής σας για {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} συνεχόμενες ημέρες.
el.longDescription: Ολοκληρώστε τις συνεδρίες εξόρυξης για {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} συνεχόμενες ημέρες για να κερδίσετε μια ειδική ανταμοιβή.
el.errorDescription: Η επαλήθευση της σειράς απέτυχε. Βεβαιωθείτε ότι έχετε ολοκληρώσει {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} συνεχόμενες ημέρες.

en.title: Complete {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-Day Streak
en.shortDescription: Keep your mining streak for {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} days straight.
en.longDescription: Complete mining sessions for {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} consecutive days to earn a special reward.
en.errorDescription: Streak verification failed. Please ensure you’ve completed {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} consecutive days.

es.title: Completa una racha de {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} días
es.shortDescription: Mantén tu racha de minería durante {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} días seguidos.
es.longDescription: Completa sesiones de minería durante {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} días consecutivos para ganar una recompensa especial.
es.errorDescription: La verificación de la racha falló. Por favor, asegúrate de haber completado {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} días consecutivos.

fa.title: تکمیل {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} روز پیوسته
fa.shortDescription: روند استخراج خود را به مدت {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} روز متوالی ادامه دهید.
fa.longDescription: جلسات استخراج را برای {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} روز متوالی کامل کنید تا پاداش ویژه‌ای دریافت کنید.
fa.errorDescription: تأیید روند انجام نشد. لطفاً مطمئن شوید که {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} روز متوالی را تکمیل کرده‌اید.

fr.title: Complétez une série de {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} jours
fr.shortDescription: Maintenez votre série de minage pendant {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} jours consécutifs.
fr.longDescription: Complétez des sessions de minage pendant {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} jours consécutifs pour gagner une récompense spéciale.
fr.errorDescription: Échec de la vérification de la série. Veuillez vous assurer que vous avez complété {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} jours consécutifs.

gu.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-દિવસની શ્રેણી પૂર્ણ કરો
gu.shortDescription: તમારી માઇનિંગ શ્રેણી {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} દિવસો સુધી ચાલુ રાખો.
gu.longDescription: વિશિષ્ટ ઈનામ મેળવા માટે સતત {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} દિવસો સુધી માઇનિંગ સત્રો પૂર્ણ કરો.
gu.errorDescription: સ્ટ્રીક ચકાસણી નિષ્ફળ. કૃપા કરીને ખાતરી કરો કે તમે સતત {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} દિવસ પૂર્ણ કર્યા છે.

he.title: השלם רצף של {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ימים
he.shortDescription: שמור על רצף הכרייה שלך במשך {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ימים רצופים.
he.longDescription: השלם סשני כרייה למשך {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ימים רצופים כדי להרוויח תגמול מיוחד.
he.errorDescription: האימות נכשל. אנא ודא שהשלמת {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ימים רצופים.

hi.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-दिवसीय स्ट्रीक पूरी करें
hi.shortDescription: अपनी माइनिंग स्ट्रीक को लगातार {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} दिनों तक बनाए रखें।
hi.longDescription: विशेष इनाम पाने के लिए लगातार {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} दिनों तक माइनिंग सत्र पूरा करें।
hi.errorDescription: स्ट्रीक सत्यापन विफल। कृपया सुनिश्चित करें कि आपने लगातार {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} दिन पूरे किए हैं।

hu.title: Teljesítsd a {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} napos sorozatot
hu.shortDescription: Tartsd meg a bányászati sorozatodat {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} napon keresztül.
hu.longDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} egymást követő nap bányászati munkamenetek teljesítésével szerezz különleges jutalmat.
hu.errorDescription: A sorozat ellenőrzése sikertelen volt. Győződj meg róla, hogy teljesítetted a {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} egymást követő napot.

id.title: Selesaikan Rangkaian {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} Hari
id.shortDescription: Pertahankan rangkaian penambangan Anda selama {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} hari berturut-turut.
id.longDescription: Selesaikan sesi penambangan selama {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} hari berturut-turut untuk mendapatkan hadiah spesial.
id.errorDescription: Verifikasi rangkaian gagal. Pastikan Anda telah menyelesaikan {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} hari berturut-turut.

it.title: Completa una serie di {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} giorni
it.shortDescription: Mantieni la tua serie di mining per {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} giorni consecutivi.
it.longDescription: Completa sessioni di mining per {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} giorni consecutivi per guadagnare una ricompensa speciale.
it.errorDescription: Verifica della serie fallita. Assicurati di aver completato {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} giorni consecutivi.

ja.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} 日連続ストリークを達成
ja.shortDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} 日間連続してマイニングストリークを維持してください。
ja.longDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} 日間連続してマイニングセッションを完了すると、特別な報酬を獲得できます。
ja.errorDescription: ストリークの確認に失敗しました。{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} 日間連続で完了したか確認してください。

jv.title: Rampungake Streak {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} Dina
jv.shortDescription: Tahan streak penambangan sampeyan kanggo {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dina berturut-turut.
jv.longDescription: Rampungake sesi penambangan kanggo {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dina berturut-turut kanggo entuk hadiah khusus.
jv.errorDescription: Verifikasi streak gagal. Priksa manawa sampeyan wis ngrampungake {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dina berturut-turut.

kn.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-ದಿನಗಳ ಸ್ಟ್ರೀಕ್ ಪೂರ್ಣಗೊಳಿಸಿ
kn.shortDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ದಿನಗಳ ಕಾಲ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಮೈನಿಂಗ್ ಸ್ಟ್ರೀಕ್ ಅನ್ನು ಮುಂದುವರಿಸಿ.
kn.longDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ನಿರಂತರ ದಿನಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಮೈನಿಂಗ್ ಸೆಷನ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಪೂರ್ಣಗೊಳಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ವಿಶೇಷ ಬಹುಮಾನವನ್ನು ಗಳಿಸಿ.
kn.errorDescription: ಸ್ಟ್ರೀಕ್ ಪರಿಶೀಲನೆ ವಿಫಲವಾಗಿದೆ. ನೀವು {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ನಿರಂತರ ದಿನಗಳನ್ನು ಪೂರ್ಣಗೊಳಿಸಿದ್ದೀರಾ ಎಂದು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

ko.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}일 연속 채굴 완료
ko.longDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}일 연속 채굴 세션을 완료하여 특별 보상을 받으세요.
ko.errorDescription: 연속 확인에 실패했습니다. {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}일 연속으로 완료했는지 확인하세요.

mr.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-दिवसांची स्ट्रीक पूर्ण करा
mr.shortDescription: तुमची माइनिंग स्ट्रीक सलग {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} दिवसांसाठी कायम ठेवा.
mr.longDescription: विशेष बक्षीस मिळवण्यासाठी सलग {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} दिवसांसाठी माइनिंग सत्रे पूर्ण करा.
mr.errorDescription: स्ट्रीक सत्यापन अयशस्वी झाले. कृपया खात्री करा की आपण सलग {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} दिवस पूर्ण केले आहेत.

ms.title: Lengkapkan Rangkaian {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} Hari
ms.shortDescription: Teruskan rangkaian perlombongan anda selama {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} hari berturut-turut.
ms.longDescription: Lengkapkan sesi perlombongan selama {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} hari berturut-turut untuk mendapat ganjaran istimewa.
ms.errorDescription: Pengesahan rangkaian gagal. Pastikan anda telah melengkapkan {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} hari berturut-turut.

nb.title: Fullfør {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-dagers streak
nb.shortDescription: Hold mining-streaken i {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dager på rad.
nb.longDescription: Fullfør mining-økter i {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} sammenhengende dager for å tjene en spesiell belønning.
nb.errorDescription: Streak-verifisering mislyktes. Vennligst sørg for at du har fullført {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} sammenhengende dager.

nn.title: Fullfør {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-dagars streak
nn.shortDescription: Hald mining-streaken din i {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dagar på rad.
nn.longDescription: Fullfør mining-økter i {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} samanhengande dagar for å tene ei spesiell belønning.
nn.errorDescription: Streak-verifisering mislukkast. Ver venleg å sørge for at du har fullført {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} samanhengande dagar.

pa.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-ਦਿਨ ਦੀ ਲੜੀ ਪੂਰੀ ਕਰੋ
pa.shortDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ਦਿਨਾਂ ਲਈ ਆਪਣੀ ਮਾਈਨਿੰਗ ਲੜੀ ਜਾਰੀ ਰੱਖੋ।
pa.longDescription: ਇੱਕ ਖ਼ਾਸ ਇਨਾਮ ਕਮਾਉਣ ਲਈ {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ਲਗਾਤਾਰ ਦਿਨਾਂ ਲਈ ਮਾਈਨਿੰਗ ਸੈਸ਼ਨ ਪੂਰੇ ਕਰੋ।
pa.errorDescription: ਲੜੀ ਦੀ ਪੁਸ਼ਟੀ ਫੇਲ੍ਹ ਹੋ ਗਈ। ਕਿਰਪਾ ਕਰਕੇ ਯਕੀਨੀ ਬਣਾਓ ਕਿ ਤੁਸੀਂ ਲਗਾਤਾਰ {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ਦਿਨ ਪੂਰੇ ਕੀਤੇ ਹਨ।

pl.title: Ukończ serię {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dni
pl.shortDescription: Zachowaj ciągłość wydobycia przez {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dni z rzędu.
pl.longDescription: Ukończ sesje wydobycia przez {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dni z rzędu, aby zdobyć specjalną nagrodę.
pl.errorDescription: Weryfikacja serii nie powiodła się. Upewnij się, że ukończyłeś {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dni z rzędu.

pt.title: Complete uma série de {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dias
pt.shortDescription: Mantenha sua sequência de mineração por {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dias consecutivos.
pt.longDescription: Complete sessões de mineração por {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dias consecutivos para ganhar uma recompensa especial.
pt.errorDescription: A verificação da sequência falhou. Certifique-se de ter completado {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dias consecutivos.

ro.title: Finalizează o serie de {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} zile
ro.shortDescription: Menține seria de mining timp de {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} zile consecutive.
ro.longDescription: Finalizează sesiuni de mining timp de {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} zile consecutive pentru a câștiga o recompensă specială.
ro.errorDescription: Verificarea seriei a eșuat. Te rugăm să te asiguri că ai completat {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} zile consecutive.

ru.title: Завершите серию из {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} дней
ru.shortDescription: Сохраняйте свою серию майнинга в течение {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} дней подряд.
ru.longDescription: Завершайте майнинг-сессии в течение {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} подряд идущих дней, чтобы заработать особую награду.
ru.errorDescription: Ошибка проверки серии. Пожалуйста, убедитесь, что вы завершили {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} подряд идущих дней.

sk.title: Dokončite sériu {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dní
sk.shortDescription: Udržujte svoju sériu ťažby po dobu {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dní v kuse.
sk.longDescription: Dokončite ťažobné relácie počas {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} po sebe idúcich dní a získajte špeciálnu odmenu.
sk.errorDescription: Overenie série zlyhalo. Uistite sa, že ste dokončili ťažbu počas {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} po sebe idúcich dní.

sl.title: Dokončajte niz {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dni
sl.shortDescription: Ohranite svoj rudarniški niz {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dni zapored.
sl.longDescription: Dokončajte rudarniške seje {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} zaporednih dni in si prislužite posebno nagrado.
sl.errorDescription: Preverjanje niza ni uspelo. Preverite, ali ste dokončali {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} zaporednih dni.

sq.title: Përfundo serinë {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ditore
sq.shortDescription: Mbajeni serinë tuaj të minierës për {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ditë rresht.
sq.longDescription: Përfundoni seancat e minierave për {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ditë rresht për të fituar një shpërblim të veçantë.
sq.errorDescription: Verifikimi i serisë dështoi. Ju lutemi sigurohuni që keni përfunduar {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ditë rresht.

sv.title: Slutför {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-dagars streak
sv.shortDescription: Behåll din mining-streak i {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dagar i rad.
sv.longDescription: Slutför miningsessioner i {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dagar i rad för att tjäna en speciell belöning.
sv.errorDescription: Streak-verifiering misslyckades. Kontrollera att du har slutfört {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} dagar i rad.

te.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-రోజుల స్ట్రీక్ ను పూర్తి చేయండి
te.shortDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} రోజుల పాటు మీ మైనింగ్ స్ట్రీక్ ను కొనసాగించండి.
te.longDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} వరుస రోజుల పాటు మైనింగ్ సెషన్లను పూర్తి చేసి ప్రత్యేక బహుమతిని పొందండి.
te.errorDescription: స్ట్రీక్ ధృవీకరణ విఫలమైంది. మీరు {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} వరుస రోజులు పూర్తి చేశారా అని నిర్ధారించండి.

th.title: ทำสตรีค {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} วันให้สำเร็จ
th.shortDescription: รักษาสตรีคการขุดของคุณเป็นเวลา {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} วันติดต่อกัน
th.longDescription: ทำการขุดให้เสร็จสิ้นติดต่อกัน {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} วันเพื่อรับรางวัลพิเศษ
th.errorDescription: การยืนยันสตรีคล้มเหลว โปรดตรวจสอบให้แน่ใจว่าคุณได้ทำครบ {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} วันติดต่อกัน

tr.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} Günlük Seriyi Tamamlayın
tr.shortDescription: Madencilik serinizi {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} gün boyunca devam ettirin.
tr.longDescription: Özel bir ödül kazanmak için {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} gün üst üste madencilik seanslarını tamamlayın.
tr.errorDescription: Seri doğrulaması başarısız oldu. Lütfen {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} gün üst üste tamamladığınızdan emin olun.

uk.title: Завершіть серію з {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} днів
uk.shortDescription: Продовжуйте свою серію майнінгу протягом {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} днів поспіль.
uk.longDescription: Завершуйте сеанси майнінгу протягом {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} днів поспіль, щоб отримати спеціальну винагороду.
uk.errorDescription: Перевірка серії не вдалася. Переконайтеся, що ви завершили {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} днів поспіль.

ur.title: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}-دن کی سٹریک مکمل کریں
ur.shortDescription: {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} دن تک اپنی مائننگ سٹریک برقرار رکھیں۔
ur.longDescription: ایک خاص انعام حاصل کرنے کے لیے مسلسل {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} دن کے لیے مائننگ سیشنز مکمل کریں۔
ur.errorDescription: سٹریک کی تصدیق ناکام ہو گئی۔ براہ کرم یقینی بنائیں کہ آپ نے مسلسل {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} دن مکمل کیے ہیں۔

vi.title: Hoàn thành chuỗi {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ngày
vi.shortDescription: Giữ chuỗi khai thác của bạn trong {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ngày liên tiếp.
vi.longDescription: Hoàn thành các phiên khai thác trong {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ngày liên tiếp để nhận phần thưởng đặc biệt.
vi.errorDescription: Xác minh chuỗi không thành công. Vui lòng đảm bảo bạn đã hoàn thành đủ {{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}} ngày liên tiếp.

zh-hant.title: 完成{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}天連續記錄
zh-hant.shortDescription: 保持您的挖礦連續記錄達到{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}天。
zh-hant.longDescription: 完成{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}天連續挖礦以獲得特別獎勵。
zh-hant.errorDescription: 連續記錄驗證失敗。請確保您已連續完成{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}天。

zh.title: 完成{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}天连续记录
zh.shortDescription: 保持您的挖矿连续记录达到{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}天。
zh.longDescription: 完成{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}天连续挖矿以获得特别奖励。
zh.errorDescription: 连续记录验证失败。请确保您已连续完成{{.RequiredMiningStreakNumber}}天。
